name: Tessa: The Huntress
description:
Tessa: The Huntress is an open-world action/adventure game set in Ancient Greece, that follows the journey of the titular character as a new devotee of the Goddess of the Hunt, Artemis. Throughout the story, Tessa interacts with other devotees who will guide and assist her, makes use of her trusted bow and spear to hunt varied creatures, ranging from common game animals like rabbits to mythical abominations like hydras and minotaurs. Through these hunts she honors her Goddess, who in turn provides blessings and wisdom, allowing Tessa to grow into a true champion of the faith.

Instructions

The menus can be navigated with the mouse (main menu, pause, etc), and the game’s controls are the following:

  • WASD keys to move;
  • Mouse to move the camera;
  • Shift to run;
  • Ctrl to dodge;
  • E key to switch weapons;
  • While holding the spear:
    • Left Mouse Button to do a quick attack;
    • Right Mouse Button to do a heavy attack;
  • While holding the bow:
    • Hold Right Mouse Button to aim;
    • Left Mouse Button when aiming to shoot an arrow;
    • Hold G to empower the current arrow (this ability is only unlocked after defeating the first boss, however).
